revised_title: Observations on Cinnabar and Gunpowder: Chemical Composition and Properties
tldr: In this article, Anthony van Leeuwenhoek examines the properties of cinnabar and gunpowder through a series of experiments. He discovers various chemical reactions and the formation of different shapes and particles under heat. He also studies the expansion of air and the composition of gunpowder, providing insights into the improvement of firearms.
